column3: [' (StepDescription: Add-1 tsp Sriracha sauce to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1/4 cup mayonnaise to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-add chopped scallion to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 can drained tuna to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Season-season 1/4 tsp pepper on the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: place-place avocado slices on each leaf)']
[' (StepDescription: top-top lettuce leaves with the tuna mixture)']
[' (StepDescription: secure-secure the wrap with a toothpick)']
